name: Viewnemy
description:
In Viewnemy you are in a completely dark tower full of enemies and traps.
The funny thing is that those enemies will help you to climb the tower using their faint light.
You need to clear (turning off all enemies) the whole floor in order to pass to the next level.

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move.
  • "X" to jump or "B".

EDIT: I uploaded a new version in HTML5, adding "B" as another button to jump because lots of you didn't like the "X" jump position.  
You can still play the original flash version down below.

Unfortunately I ran out of time so I made only a few levels, but I hope you enjoy it anyway. :)

A game made by havana24.net
Follow me on twitter @hav24

Music by Playonloop
